title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.27 - Alcohol and drug unit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.27 - Alcohol and drug unit

State Regulations
A unit for the care of alcohol and/or drug rehabilitation
inpatients. The hospital must also employ specially trained personnel to staff
this unit, and at least one psychiatrist must be on the medical
staff. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
